moves.1. e4: this is a classic move to start a game it great because opens the queen and bishop file.
moves.1... c5: this is a good move- its how you start the scillian opening
moves.2. Nf3: i did this move so that i will be able to move my queens pawn up two spaces and start the game on the right foot.
moves.2... d6: this is not part of the sicillian defence- i think he will want to bring his bishop to attack my knight that is on the space-f3
moves.3. h3: so i saw he was going to do that so i defended it.
moves.3... Nf6: with that he develops his pieces and is now attacking my pawn so i have to responde.
moves.4. Nc3: by doing this i develop my bored and im now defending my pawn.
moves.5. Bc4: by doing this i plan to bring my knight that is now on f3 and move it to g5 so that i can fork the rook and queen.
moves.5... g6:
i have to say at the moment i do not see why he did this...
:-)... mabye to bring his bishop out- whci is blocked by to pawns and cant get out any time soon.
moves.6. O-O: i castled-why not i think its alwasy good to castle early in the game its a goood defence.
moves.6... Bg7: by doing this he will be able to castle next turn but also he is developing his pecies - a good defence
moves.7. d3: by doing this i open my bishop file whcih is very helpful
moves.7... a6: protecting that i wont be able to pin his knight with my bishop
moves.8. Ng5: by doing this im hoping to get his pawn and fork his queen and rook
moves.8... O-O:
he saw it-- i hoped not- anyways a good way to develop and portect against my
plan.
moves.9. Nd5: i do this to try and get his knight even though protected it will ruin his defence
moves.9... b5: a good way to get me to move my bishop
moves.10. Nxf6+ exf6 11. Nxf7 Rxf7 12. Bd5 Bb7: that was a my revenge on losing toi him twice because of stupid mistakes when he could have lost twice before - so finally i won!!!------- sorry about my spelling i hoped you enjoied the game!!
